ygData.subject: Re: fun with charm
ygData.msgSnippet: One question i ve never used Colorflux, I know it stuns but... for how long? how much mana does it take? and how long does it take to cast? is it good?
ygData.messageBody:
One question i've never used Colorflux, I know it
stuns but... for how long? how much mana does it take?
and how long does it take to cast?
is it good? normally i just cast mezmerize inbetween
hits and hopesit misses once.
The Wanderer

--- Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...> wrote:
> From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>
>
>
> > I'm not up to the level of getting charm yet, but
> > I've read that when the
> > charm wears off, the
> > creature attacks you. He'll be fighting you with
> > the weapon you gave it,
> > right?
>
> Yes. But you can always get it back :)
> >
> > How does charm work? If your in trouble and
> getting
> > attacked, can you
> > charm it during a fight or does it
> > take a while to cast?
>
> Hard to get off while being hit but it can be done,
> especially if you start with a colorflux, or manage
> to
> mesmerize it first.
>
> > Is chr a factor in charm?
>
> Seems to be but I don't think anyone has done an
> exhaustive experiment on this. It seems to effect
> the
> duration of the charm, probably to the effect that
> the
> number of times the creature tries to break out of
> charm in any given minute is related to how much chr
> you have.
>
> > How long do things
> > usually stay charmed?
>
> Sometimes as little as a few seconds, other times it
> can last several minutes, enough to fight one or two
> fights.
>
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> > Azboklin the enchanter who will definatly charm
> > things when he gets the spell
> >
> >
>
